message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but I'm looking to pay closer to $9,000. Would you be willing to come down a bit?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,000?
